TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IPv4InterfaceProperties extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供支援網際網路通訊協定第 4 版 (IPv4) 之網路介面的相關資訊。

span.span: Provides information about network interfaces that support Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會提供存取支援 IPv4 的網路介面的組態和位址資訊。This class provides access to configuration and address information for network interfaces that support IPv4. 您不會建立此類別; 事件類別的執行個體所傳回方法。You do not create instances of this class; they are returned by the method. IPV6 內容，請參閱。For IPV6 properties, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得物件，並顯示其資料。The following code example gets an object and displays its data. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以呼叫這個建構函式只能由衍生自的。This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Index As Integer
public: abstract property int Index { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得與網際網路通訊協定第 4 版 (IPv4) 位址相關聯的網路介面的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the network interface associated with the Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) address.
An that contains the index of the IPv4 interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性的值為零，這個介面不支援 IPv4。If the value of this property is zero, IPv4 is not supported by this interface. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得物件，並顯示其資料。The following code example gets an object and displays its data. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsAutomaticPrivateAddressingActive As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsAutomaticPrivateAddressingActive { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得 值，指出這個介面是否擁有自動私人 IP 定址 (APIPA) 位址。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this interface has an automatic private IP addressing (APIPA) address.

value.span: 如果此介面使用 APIPA 位址，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the interface uses an APIPA address; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自動私人 IP 位址，可讓沒有以自動指派 IP 位址不衝突的公用位址與動態主機設定通訊協定 (DHCP) 伺服器的存取權的電腦。Automatic private IP addressing allows computers that do not have access to a Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) server to be automatically assigned an IP address that does not conflict with public addresses. 這些位址是在範圍內 169.254.0.0 169.254.255.255 之間。These addresses are in the range 169.254.0.0 to 169.254.255.255. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得物件，並顯示其資料。The following code example gets an object and displays its data. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsAutomaticPrivateAddressingEnabled As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsAutomaticPrivateAddressingEnabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得 值，指出這個介面是否已啟用自動私人 IP 定址 (APIPA)。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this interface has automatic private IP addressing (APIPA) enabled.

value.span: 如果此介面使用 APIPA，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the interface uses APIPA; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自動私人 IP 位址，可讓沒有以自動指派 IP 位址不衝突的公用位址與動態主機設定通訊協定 (DHCP) 伺服器的存取權的電腦。Automatic private IP addressing allows computers that do not have access to a Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) server to be automatically assigned an IP address that does not conflict with public addresses. 這些位址是在範圍內 169.254.0.0 169.254.255.255 之間。These addresses are in the range 169.254.0.0 to 169.254.255.255. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得物件，並顯示其資料。The following code example gets an object and displays its data. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsDhcpEnabled As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsDhcpEnabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得 值，指出此介面是否已設定為使用動態主機設定通訊協定 (DHCP) 伺服器取得 IP 位址。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the interface is configured to use a Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) server to obtain an IP address.

value.span: 如果此介面已設定成由 DHCP 伺服器取得 IP 位址，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the interface is configured to obtain an IP address from a DHCP server; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性是`true`，DHCP 伺服器會將介面的 IP 位址時電腦會建立其網路連線。When this property is `true`, a DHCP server assigns the IP address to the interface when the computer establishes its network connections. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得物件，並顯示其資料。The following code example gets an object and displays its data. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsForwardingEnabled As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsForwardingEnabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得 值，指出這個介面是否可以轉送封包。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this interface can forward (route) packets.

value.span: 如果這個介面可以轉送封包，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this interface routes packets; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已停用路由，則會捨棄封包所接收的介面未持有目的地位址的介面。If routing is disabled, packets that are received by the interface with a destination address that is not held by the interface are discarded. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得物件，並顯示其資料。The following code example gets an object and displays its data. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Mtu As Integer
public: abstract property int Mtu { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個網路介面的最大傳輸單位 (MTU)。

span.span: Gets the maximum transmission unit (MTU) for this network interface.

value.span: 指定 MTU 的 值。

span.span: An value that specifies the MTU.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網路介面的 MTU 是可以傳輸的最大封包。The MTU of a network interface is the largest packet that can be transmitted. 它被以八位元 （8 位元位元組為單位）。It is measured in octets (8-bit bytes). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得物件，並顯示其資料。The following code example gets an object and displays its data. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property UsesWins As Boolean
public: abstract property bool UsesWins { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得 值，指出介面是否使用 Windows 網際網路名稱服務 (WINS)。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether an interface uses Windows Internet Name Service (WINS).

value.span: 如果介面使用 WINS，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the interface uses WINS; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks WINS 提供分散式的資料庫，用以登錄及查詢動態 IPv4 位址對應的 NetBIOS 名稱。WINS provides a distributed database for registering and querying dynamic NetBIOS names to IPv4 address mappings. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得物件，並顯示其資料。The following code example gets an object and displays its data. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]
